text: Des Hommes is a Franco-Belgian film written and directed by Lucas Belvaux, released in 2020. It is the adaptation of the novel Des hommes by Laurent Mauvignier. The film, selected in the official competition at Cannes, received the 2020 Cannes Film Festival label. ==Synopsis== They were sent to Algeria during the "events" in 1960. Two years later, Bernard, Rabut, Février, and others returned to France. They remained silent and lived their lives. But sometimes, it takes almost nothing, like a winter birthday or a small gift, for the past to suddenly come back into the lives of those who thought they could deny it, even forty years later. === Sélections === * Label Festival de Cannes 2020Pourquoi le « Label Cannes » donne le sourire aux professionnels du cinéma, on 20minutes.fr, consulted the 20 october 2023 * Angoulême French- speaking Film Festival 2020 : hors compétition"J'espère le voir grandir jusqu'à ma mort !" : malgré la Covid, Dominique Besnehard annonce un programme éclatant pour son festival du film d'Angoulême, on francetvinfo.fr, consulted the 20 october 2023 * Brussels Film Festival 2020 : film d'ouvertureBRIFF:Des hommes, une douloureuse évocation de la guerre d'Algérie , on rtbf.be, consulted the 20 october 2023 * Deauville American Film Festival 2020 : hors compétition * International Historical Fiction Film Festival 2020 : sélection officielle * Rome International Film Festival 2020 : sélection officielleDES HOMMES DE LUCAS BELVAUX EN SÉLECTION OFFICIELLE À ROME, on wbimages.be, consulted the 20 october 2023 * French Film Festival UK 2020 : section PanoramaDes hommes, Lola vers la mer et La Forêt de mon père au French Film Festival UK, on wbimages.be, consulted the 20 october 2023 * Label Lumières d'Afrique 2020Des hommes, on lumieresdafrique.com, consulted the 20 october 2023 == References == == Notes ==
